TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 代表 Windows 清單檢視控制項，顯示出使用四種不同檢視的其中一個就可以顯示出來的項目集合。

span.span: Represents a Windows list view control, which displays a collection of items that can be displayed using one of four different views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可讓您顯示的項目文字和 （選擇性） 識別的項目類型圖示的項目清單。A control allows you to display a list of items with item text and, optionally, an icon to identify the type of item. 比方說，Windows 檔案總管的檔案清單是在外觀上與類似控制項。For example, the Windows Explorer list of files is similar in appearance to a control. 它會顯示檔案和資料夾樹狀目錄中目前選取的清單。It displays a list of the files and folders currently selected in the tree. 每個檔案和資料夾會顯示以協助識別的檔案或資料夾類型相關聯的圖示。Each file and folder displays an icon associated with it to help identify the type of file or folder. 類別代表內的項目控制項。The class represents an item within a control. 會顯示在清單中的項目可以顯示五個不同檢視的其中一個。The items that are displayed in the list can be shown in one of five different views. 為大圖示為小圖示，或以垂直清單中的小圖示時，會顯示項目。Items can be displayed as large icons, as small icons, or as small icons in a vertical list. 項目也可以有子項目，其中包含與父項目相關的資訊。Items can also have subitems which contain information that is related to the parent item. [詳細資料] 檢視可讓您具有資料行標頭，可識別在子項目中所顯示的資訊的方格中顯示的項目和它的子項目。The details view allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 並排顯示檢視，其中具有有限的可用性，如下所述，可讓您為圖格，其中包含大型圖示旁邊的文字資訊顯示項目和它的子項目。The tile view, which has limited availability as described below, allows you to display the item and its subitems as a tile that contains a large icon next to the textual information. 支援單一或多個選取項目。 supports single or multiple selection. 多個選取項目功能可讓使用者從項目中的方式類似於清單中選取控制項。The multiple selection feature lets the user select from a list of items in a way similar to a control. 此外，使用者可以啟動選取的項目執行的工作。Additionally, the user can activate selected items to perform a task. 例如，您可以使用控制項來顯示一份檔案，然後開啟再利用應用程式。For example, you could use a control to display a list of files that the application can then open and utilize. 使用者可以選取要開啟，然後按兩下 啟動項目，並在應用程式中開啟檔案的檔案。The user can select the files to open and then double-click them to activate the items and open the files in the application. 也可以顯示核取方塊，使用屬性，可讓使用者檢查他們想要執行的動作上的項目。The can also display check boxes, using the property, to allow the user to check the items that they want to perform an action on. 您可以使用控制各種不同的方式。You can use the control in a variety of ways. 控制項可用來顯示應用程式、 資料庫或文字檔中的資訊。The control can be used to display information from an application, a database, or a text file. 也可用來取得使用者，例如選取一組處理檔案的資訊。The can also be used to obtain information from the user, such as selecting a set of files to process. 提供大量的屬性，可提供彈性的外觀和行為。 provides a large number of properties that provide flexibility in appearance and behavior. 屬性可讓您變更項目顯示的方式。The property allows you to change the way in which items are displayed. ， ，和屬性可讓您指定包含的項目，並在所顯示之影像的物件，核取方塊會顯示當屬性設定為`true`。The , , and properties allow you to specify the objects that contain the images displayed for items and, in the case of the , the check boxes that are displayed when the property is set to `true`. 若要判斷選取的項目，您可以使用屬性來存取集合。To determine which items are checked, you can use the property to access the collection. 屬性可讓您存取，它會儲存為資料行標頭時控制項的屬性設定為。The property allows access to the , which stores the column headers that are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 加入和移除項目透過屬性。Items are added and removed from the through the property. 屬性可讓您存取控制項，提供方法來操作控制項中的項目。The property allows you to access the of the control, which provides methods for manipulating the items in the control. 如果您想要允許使用者編輯項目的文字，您可以使用屬性。If you want to allow the user to edit the text of an item, you can use the property. 當您的控制項包含大量的項目時，通常很容易讓使用者在已排序的清單中看到它們。When your control contains a large number of items, it is often easier for the user to see them in a sorted list. 您可以使用屬性依字母順序排序項目。You can use the property to sort the items alphabetically. 您可以完全自訂的外觀控制項。You can also completely customize the appearance of a control. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性，以`true`，並處理一或多個下列事件： ， ， 。To do this, set the property to `true` and handle one or more of the following events: , , . 許多的屬性顯示的項目時使用控制項的屬性設定為。Many of the properties of the control are used when the property of the control is set to . 屬性可讓使用者的您重新設定資料行的順序，在執行階段的控制項。The property allows the user of your control to reconfigure the order of columns at run time. 屬性可以讓項目和它的子項目，而非只是項目選取。The property allows an item and its subitems to be selected instead of just the item. 在識別的項目和子項目界限的詳細資料 檢視中顯示格線，您可以使用屬性。To display gridlines in the details view to identify the boundaries of items and subitems in the , you can use the property. 屬性可讓您指定要顯示的資料行標頭的型別。The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display. A控制項能在虛擬模式中，其中物件動態產生，而不是儲存在集合。A control can operate in virtual mode, where objects are generated dynamically instead of being stored in the collection. 這可用於處理極大型清單或其內容經常變更的清單。This can be useful for dealing with very large lists or lists whose contents frequently change. 若要啟用虛擬模式，請設定屬性，以`true`，並處理， ，和事件。To enable Virtual mode, set the property to `true` and handle the , , and events. 除了許多屬性，可供控制項，有方法和事件，您的應用程式可以用來提供額外的功能。In addition to the many properties that are available for a control, there are methods and events that your application can use to provide additional capabilities to the . 並方法可讓您提升效能，當您將新增多項目無法藉由防止控制項重繪每當新增項目。The and methods allow you to improve performance when you add many items to a by preventing the control from repainting every time that an item is added. 如果您控制項顯示的項目和子項目，您可能想要提供的功能，當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下子項目。If your control is displaying items and subitems, you may want to provide functionality when the user right-clicks a subitem. 若要判斷其子項目所按一下的項目，您可以使用方法。To determine the item whose subitem is being clicked, you can use the method. 時執行驗證的項目之後使用者已編輯它們,，您可能想要顯示給使用者，以變更的特定項目。When performing validation of the items after the user has edited them, you may want to display a specific item to the user to change. 可以呼叫方法，以確保特定項目是在控制項的可見區域。The method can be called to ensure that the specific item is in the visible area of the control. 如果屬性設定為`true`，您可以執行工作，例如驗證之前和之後的文字變更所建立的事件處理常式正在編輯的文字和事件。If the property set to `true`, you can perform tasks such as validating the text being edited before and after the text changed by creating an event handler for the and events. 若要執行工作，例如開啟檔案，或顯示對話方塊以編輯項目中顯示，您可以建立的事件處理常式事件。To perform tasks such as opening a file or displaying a dialog box to edit an item displayed in a , you can create an event handler for the event. 如果您允許使用者排序中的項目當使用者按一下資料行標頭，您可以建立的事件處理常式事件來執行排序。If you allow the user to sort the items in a when they click a column header, you can create an event handler for the event to perform the sorting. 當屬性設定為`true`，您可以判斷何時發生的項目核取狀態的變更來處理事件。When the property is set to `true`, you can determine when a change in an item's check state has occurred by handling the event. 您也可以設定的背景影像與屬性。You can also set a background image for the with the property. 您的應用程式必須擁有在其`Main`方法，以正確顯示的背景影像控制項。Your application must have the on its `Main` method to correctly display the background image for the control. 此外，如果具有背景影像的控制項裝載於 Internet Explorer、 comctl32.dll 版本 6.0 指定為應用程式資訊清單檔中的相依組件，直到確定背景影像是顯示的屬性。In addition, if a control with a background image is hosted in Internet Explorer, specify comctl32.dll version 6.0 as a dependent assembly in the application manifest file to ensure the background image is property displayed. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性控制項中的資料指標的外觀就不會影響[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1 及更早版本的版本。Setting the property for a control has no affect on the appearance of the cursor in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versions 1.1 and earlier. Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 提供三項功能可增強控制當您的應用程式呼叫方法： 並排顯示檢視、 分組和插入標記。Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 provide three features that enhance the control when your application calls the method: tile view, grouping, and the insertion mark. 並排顯示檢視，可讓您平衡圖形和文字資訊，方法是顯示大圖示旁邊的項目和子項目文字。The tile view lets you balance graphical and textual information by displaying item and subitem text next to large icons. 設定屬性設若要啟用此行為。Set the property to to enable this behavior. 「 群組 」 功能可讓您以視覺化方式將項目分組為相關的類別。The grouping feature lets you visually group items into related categories. 使用要加入屬性物件到控制要啟用這項功能。Use the property to add objects to the control when you want to enable this feature. 若要暫時停用此功能，請設定屬性設`false`。To temporarily disable the feature, set the property to `false`. 插入標記功能可讓您提供拖放項目重新定位與視覺化回應以表示置放位置。The insertion mark feature lets you provide drag-and-drop item repositioning with visual feedback to indicate drop locations. 使用物件，透過擷取顯示插入標記的屬性。Use the object retrieved through the property to display the insertion mark. 這些功能都僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003。These features are available only under Windows XP and Windows Server 2003. 在舊版的作業系統，與這些功能相關聯的程式碼沒有任何作用，並排顯示檢視會顯示為大圖示檢視中，且插入標記和群組不會顯示。On earlier operating systems, the code that relate to these features has no effect, the tile view appears as the large icon view, and the insertion mark and groups do not display. 在某些情況下，您可能想要包含決定是否可用，這些功能的程式碼，並提供替代功能時，它們無法使用。In some cases, you might want to include code that determines whether these features are available, and provide alternate functionality when they are unavailable. 這些功能會提供相同的程式庫，提供作業系統的佈景主題功能。These features are provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. 下表顯示一些成員和檢視中有效。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成員ListView member|檢視View| |---------------------|----------| | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 屬性 property|以外的所有檢視 All views except | | 屬性 property|| | 屬性 property|、 或 , , or | ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. summary.span: 取得或設定使用者必須採取才能夠啟動項目的動作類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of action the user must take to activate an item.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的使用者將如何啟動中的項目控制項。The property allows you to specify how the user will activate an item in the control. 正在啟用中的項目不同於只選取項目。Activating an item in a differs from just selecting an item. 動作項目啟動時，通常事件處理常式中執行事件。When an item is activated, an action is typically performed in an event handler for the event. 例如，啟動項目時您可能會開啟檔案，或顯示對話方塊，可讓要編輯的項目。For example, when an item is activated you might open a file or display a dialog box that allows the item to be edited. 一般而言，按兩下項目時由使用者啟用它。Typically, an item is double-clicked by the user to activate it. 如果屬性設定為，按一下的項目一次啟動它。If the property is set to , clicking the item one time activates it. 設定屬性設不同於標準的按兩下，因為點選兩次可以有它們之間的時間長度。Setting the property to differs from the standard double-click because the two clicks can have any duration between them. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為或是，編輯標籤將不允許的值為何屬性。If the property is set to or , label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the property.

exception.span: 指定的值不是其中一個 成員。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AfterLabelEdit As LabelEditEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者編輯項目的標籤時。

span.span: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者完成修改項目的文字時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item. 使用者輸入項目的新字串會傳遞至事件和事件處理常式可以拒絕變更。The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change. 如果事件處理常式會拒絕變更，文字會在使用者開始編輯項目之前時，還原為文字。If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item. > [!NOTE] > 因為事件會在標籤編輯認可，呼叫之前這個事件處理常式方法會排序使用的原始值的項目。Because the event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value. 為了讓會引發事件屬性控制項必須設為`true`。In order for the event to be raised, the property of the control must be set to `true`. 您可以建立的事件處理常式事件，以執行工作，才能在使用者編輯項目的文字。You can create an event handler for the event to perform tasks before the user edits the text of an item. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用字母表中的字元限制的新編輯的標籤的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 此範例會使用類別來取得新的標籤的每個字元的 ASCII 字元碼。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果字元落在代表數字的 ASCII 碼，新的標籤無法套用至項目。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 這個範例需要您已建立表單和它所加入的項目上的控制項。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 這個範例也會需要您已連接範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式的事件。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 若要使用類別，您的檔案必須包含命名空間。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. [!code-cpp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者開始修改項目的文字時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item. 如果事件處理常式取消這個事件，則使用者無法編輯文字。If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot edit the text. 您可以使用這個事件，若要防止使用者編輯中的特定項目的控制項。You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the control. 如果的屬性控制設為`false`，則不會引發事件; 所有的使用者嘗試以編輯項目標籤會自動被拒絕。If the property of the control is set to `false`, the event is not raised; all user attempts to edit item labels are automatically rejected. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何處理事件，並使用和屬性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含控制項，名為`ListView1`並填入三個以上的項目。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control named `ListView1` and populated with at least three items. 請確定事件處理常式，在範例中為其事件相關聯。Ensure the event handler in the example is associated with its event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最好將多個項目加入是使用方法(經由屬性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 這可讓您將項目陣列加入至單一作業中的清單。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 不過，如果您想要新增項目在階段使用的其中一個方法類別，您可以使用方法，以防止控制項重繪每當新增項目。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the every time that an item is added. 當您已完成的工作項目加入控制項時，呼叫方法，以啟用重新繪製。When you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 新增項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的當正在許多項目加入至控制項。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when lots of items are being added to the control. 如果呼叫一次以上，必須呼叫對等的次數。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 最後一個呼叫將不會重新繪製。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 此外，多次呼叫會有任何作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化包含核取方塊控制項。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它也會示範如何使用和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the and methods. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`ListView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `ListView1`. 呼叫`InititalizeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只會發生此事件時是`true`。This event only occurs when is `true`. 處理此事件可讓更新項目資訊保留在快取，使它隨時可用。Handling this event allows the to update the item information held in the cache so that it is readily available. 這可以改善大型清單或清單，其中的項目會計算耗費資源的效能。This can improve performance on large lists, or lists whose items are expensive to calculate. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會檢查以確定快取重新整理真有必要，並重建快取。In the example, the event handler checks to make sure a cache refresh is really necessary, and then rebuilds the cache. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分屬性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項中每個項目的旁邊是否要出現核取方塊。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您在清單中顯示每個項目旁的核取方塊。The property allows you to display a check box next to each item in the list. 這可讓您的應用程式，以顯示項目清單 (和子項如果屬性設定為`View.Details`) 使用者可以選取核取方塊，即可。This enables your application to display a list of items (and subitems if the property is set to `View.Details`) that the user can select by clicking the check box. 屬性提供的方式來選取多個項目控制項，而不需使用 CTRL 鍵。The property offers a way to select multiple items in the control without using the CTRL key. 根據您的應用程式中，使用核取方塊來選取項目，而不是標準的多個選取的方法可能會讓使用者更容易。Depending on your application, using check boxes to select items rather than the standard multiple selection method may be easier for the user. 即使的屬性控制設為 `false`，您仍可以顯示核取方塊，並提供給使用者的多個選取項目功能。Even if the property of the control is set to `false`, you can still display checkboxes and provide multiple selection capabilities to the user. 如果您不想要選取多個項目但仍想要允許使用者選擇多個項目從清單中，執行您的應用程式內的作業，這項功能相當實用。This feature can be useful if you do not want multiple items to be selected yet still want to allow the user to choose multiple items from the list to perform an operation within your application. 若要判斷何時已檢查的項目，建立事件處理常式事件。To determine when an item has been checked, create an event handler for the event. 若要取得簽入的所有項目，使用屬性來存取控制項。To get all the items that are checked in the , use the property to access the for the control. 若要取得簽入的所有項目的索引，使用屬性。To get the indexes of all items that are checked in the , use the property. 如果中指定屬性，在 0 和 1 中的索引位置的映像而不是核取方塊會顯示。If an is specified in the property, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 而不是未檢查的核取方塊，顯示的影像索引位置 0，而不是已核取核取方塊顯示的影像索引位置 1。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box. > [!NOTE] > 當您將此屬性設定為`true`，則就會發生事件。When you set this property to `true`, the event occurs. > > 核取方塊不會顯示何時屬性設定為。Check boxes are not displayed when the property is set to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生於使用者按一下資料行標頭中的項目詳細資料檢視中的其中一個控制項 (當屬性設定為)。The event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a control (when the property is set to ). 通常處理事件，以排序中的項目使用按資料行的資料行排序。The event is typically handled to sort the items in the using the clicked column as the column to sort by. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立包含表單的表單控制項，以手動方式排序項目中的資料行時按一下控制項時。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 此範例會定義一個叫做類別`ListViewItemComparer`可實執行介面比較。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 此範例會建立的執行個體`ListViewItemComparer`並使用它來設定屬性控制項。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法呼叫中事件處理常式使用中定義的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来執行的項目，根據按下的資料行排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可讓您自訂的外觀使用主控描繪的控制項。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 會引發此事件時，才屬性設定為`true`。It is raised only when the property is set to `true`. 如需主控描繪的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性參考主題。For more information about owner drawing, see the property reference topic. 針對每個可能會發生事件項目。The event can occur for each item. 當屬性設定為，則和事件也可能會發生。When the property is set to , the and events also occur. 在此情況下，您可以處理事件來繪製所有的項目，例如背景，常見的項目和處理事件來繪製個別的子項目，例如文字值的項目。In this case, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all items, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 您也可以繪製所有項目可能很不方便使用的兩個事件，其中之一的控制。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要繪製資料行的標頭詳細資料檢視中，您必須處理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 因為在基礎 Win32 控制項中，錯誤雖說是就會發生事件事件一次每個資料列詳細資料檢視，當滑鼠指標移至資料列時，造成任何項目中繪製是事件處理常式依繪製自訂背景繪製事件處理常式。Because of a bug in the underlying Win32 control, the event occurs without accompanying events once per row in the details view when the mouse pointer moves over the row, causing anything painted in a event handler to be painted over by a custom background drawn in a event handler. 請參閱中的範例失效每個資料列，額外的事件發生時的因應措施的參考主題。See the example in the reference topic for a workaround that invalidates each row when the extra event occurs. 一種解決方法是將所有自訂繪圖程式碼放事件處理常式和繪製整個項目 （包含子項目） 的背景時，才值為 0。An alternative workaround is to put all your custom drawing code in a event handler and paint the background for the entire item (including subitems) only when the value is 0. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供實作事件處理常式。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 完整的範例，請參閱參考主題。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可讓您自訂的外觀使用主控描繪的控制項。This event lets you customize the appearance of a control using owner drawing. 會引發此事件時，才屬性設定為`true`並屬性設定為。It is raised only when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to . 如需有關主控描繪的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性參考主題。For more information on owner drawing, see the property reference topic. > [!NOTE] > 子項目資訊通常會出現在並排顯示檢視，以及詳細資料檢視，但在圖格檢視中，它必須繪製的處理常式事件。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 針對每個可能會發生事件子項目。The event can occur for each subitem. 您可以處理事件的所有子項目，例如背景繪製通用的項目，並處理事件來繪製個別的子項目，例如文字值的項目。You can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 您也可以繪製所有項目可能很不方便使用的兩個事件，其中之一的控制。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要繪製資料行的標頭詳細資料檢視中，您必須處理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 事件不會發生的任何子項目，且未物件加入集合。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 也請注意，每個的第一個子項目物件代表父項目本身，而且會顯示在第一個資料行。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供實作事件處理常式。The following code example provides an implementation of a event handler. 完整的範例，請參閱參考主題。For the complete example, see the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最好將多個項目加入是使用方法(經由屬性)。The preferred way to add multiple items to a is to use the method of the (accessed through the property of the ). 這可讓您將項目陣列加入至單一作業中的清單。This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation. 不過，如果您想要新增項目在階段使用的其中一個方法類別，您可以使用方法，以防止控制項重繪每當新增項目。However, if you want to add items one at a time using the method of the class, you can use the method to prevent the control from repainting the each time an item is added. 一旦您已完成的工作項目加入控制項，呼叫方法，以啟用重新繪製。Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the method to enable the to repaint. 新增項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的當正在大量的項目加入至控制項。This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the when a large number of items are being added to the control. 如果呼叫一次以上，必須呼叫對等的次數。If is called more than once, must be called an equivalent number of times. 最後一個呼叫將不會重新繪製。Until the last call to the will not repaint. 此外，多次呼叫會有任何作用。Other than this, multiple calls to have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化包含核取方塊控制項。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control to contain check boxes. 它也會示範使用和方法。It also demonstrates using the and methods. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`ListView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a named `ListView1`. 呼叫`InititalizeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，以確保特定項目中可以看見控制項。You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the control. 中的項目執行驗證時，您可以呼叫方法，以確保驗證失敗的項目會顯示在控制項，以允許使用者執行的項目上的變更。When performing validation on the items in a , you can call the method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the control to allow the user to perform changes on the item. 如果您想要確保的項目會顯示位於可檢視區域的上方控制項，呼叫方法會捲動控制項的內容，直到可檢視區域中控制項的第一個項目。If the item that you want to ensure is visible is located above the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until it is the first item in the viewable area of the control. 如果項目可檢視區域的以下控制項，呼叫方法會捲動的內容控制，直到項目控制項可檢視區域中的最後一個項目。If the item is below the viewable region of the control, calling the method will scroll the contents of the control until the item is the last item in the viewable area of the control. 若要判斷項目是否位於顯示區域的頂端控制，請使用屬性。To determine if an item is located at the top of the display area of a control, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋不區分大小寫。The search is case-insensitive. `text`參數可以指定所需的相符文字的子字串。The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text. 此外，這個方法會傳回開頭為指定的文字的第一個項目。In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text. 例如，如果包含兩個清單項目-設定為"角括號 」 的第一個項目文字和設為"bracket"-呼叫的第二個項目文字傳遞`brack`作為參數傳回的文字是"bracket"的項目。For example, if a contains two list items - the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket" - a call to passing `brack` as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket". 方法會傳回`null`如果清單是空的或沒有相符的項目。The method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeFindListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeFindListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 按一下此按鈕以方法呼叫的結果。Click the button to see the results of the method call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回表示目前顯示的焦點矩形的項目控制項。The property returns the that represents the item currently displaying the focus rectangle for the control. 因為控制項有沒有直接編輯區域以外的項目，它會顯示，當控制項有焦點中的項目顯示焦點 reticle，其項目文字周圍。Because a control has no directly editable areas other than the items it displays, when the control has focus, an item within the displays the focus reticle around its item text. 一般而言，最後一個選取項目中的控制項是具有焦點的項目。Typically, the last selected item in the control is the item with focus. 雖然項目可能會顯示焦點 reticle 一，它實際上可能不是在選取的項目。Although an item may be the one displaying the focus reticle, it may not actually be a selected item in the . 使用或是屬性，以取得在選取的項目控制項，一定未選取屬性。Use the or properties to obtain the selected items in the control, the property is not necessarily selected. 您可以使用中，按一下屬性，以判斷哪一個項目上次控制項，不論選取狀態。You can use the property to determine which item was last clicked in the control, regardless of selection state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性沒有任何作用，除非屬性控制設為 。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 通常是屬性時使用使用許多的子項目和顯示項目，請務必能夠水平捲軸控制項的內容，因為看不到 項目文字時，請參閱選取的項目。The property is typically used when a displays items with many subitems and it is important to be able to see selected items when the item text is not visible due to horizontal scrolling of the control's contents. > [!NOTE] > 當設為`true`，工具提示不會顯示; 只有父代的工具提示會顯示。When is set to `true`, ToolTips for a will not be shown; only the ToolTip for the parent is displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您判斷哪些項目所在的工作區中的特定位置控制項。The method lets you determine which item is located at a specific location within the client region of the control. 當使用者按一下或以滑鼠右鍵按一下 子項目，您可以使用這個方法 (當屬性設定為`View.Details`) 和您想要判斷哪一個項目擁有的已按下根據滑鼠座標，在使用者按下滑鼠時的子項目.You can use this method when the user clicks or right-clicks a subitem (when the property is set to `View.Details`) and you want to determine which item owns the subitem that was clicked based on the mouse coordinates at the time the user clicked the mouse. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性值是`false`，這個方法會傳回項目時，才指定的位置 （這會顯示在第一個資料行，當控制項為詳細資訊模式時） 與父項目範圍內。When the property value is `false`, this method returns an item only when the specified location is within the bounds of the parent item (which is displayed in the first column when the control is in details mode). 您必須設定屬性設`true`擷取與這個方法指定的範圍內的子項目位置的項目。You must set the property to `true` to retrieve an item with this method given a location within the bounds of a subitem. 您也可以使用方法來擷取位於特定位置的項目有關的詳細的資訊。You can also use the method to retrieve detailed information about the item at a particular location. 若要執行內的項目重新定位的拖放，您可能想要方法而非方法。To do drag-and-drop repositioning of items within a , you might want to use the method rather than the method. 方法會尋找最接近的項目，不論滑鼠指標所在的位置。The method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located. 方法，相反地，傳回`null`如果在指定的位置沒有任何項目。The method, on the other hand, returns `null` if there is no item at the specified location. > [!NOTE] > 當您的應用程式呼叫支援類別只有在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003方法。The class is supported only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and controls. 初始化藉由設定並屬性使用和列舉型別，分別。The is initialized by setting the and properties using the and enumerations, respectively. 會填入的 Samples 目錄中的圖片。The is populated with pictures from the Samples directory. 方法會在處理時控制項的事件，以判斷是否已選取項目。The method is used in when handling the control's event to determine whether an item is selected. 如果選取項目，則事件處理常式就會顯示選取的檔案藉由設定屬性。If an item is selected, the event handler displays the selected file by setting the property. 這個範例需要位於 C:\documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My 圖片 \ 範例圖片的目錄中的 JPG 檔案存在。The example requires the existence of JPG files located in the C:\documents and Settings\All Users\Documents\My Pictures\Sample Pictures directory. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的表單和呼叫`InitializePictureBox`並`PopulateListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `InitializePictureBox` and `PopulateListView` methods in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 請確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性沒有任何作用，除非屬性控制設為 。The property has no effect unless the property of the control is set to . 屬性可讓您顯示識別資料列和資料行中所顯示的行控制當顯示的項目和其子項目。The property allows you to display lines to identify the rows and columns that are displayed in the control when it displays items and their subitems. 顯示的格線不會提供資料列和資料行調整為應用程式，例如 Microsoft Excel 支援的功能。The grid lines that are displayed do not provide the ability to resize rows and columns as an application such as Microsoft Excel does. 只有資料行，可以調整大小，如果顯示資料行標頭，將滑鼠指標移到右邊，要調整大小的資料行，然後按一下並拖曳之前的資料行是您想要的大小。Only columns can be resized, if column headers are displayed, by moving the mouse pointer to the right side of the column to resize and then clicking and dragging until the column is the size you want. 格線功能用來提供控制項的使用者可見的項目和子項目周圍的界限。The grid lines feature is used to provide the user of the control with visible boundaries around items and subitems. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Groups As ListViewGroupCollection

summary.span: 取得指派給控制項的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects assigned to the control.

value.span: ，其中包含 控制項中的所有群組。

span.span: A that contains all the groups in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 群組功能可讓您建立的邏輯相關的視覺化群組項目。The grouping feature lets you create visual groups of logically related items. 每個群組是由後面接著一條水平線的文字標頭和指派給該群組的項目所組成。Each group consists of a textual header followed by a horizontal line and the items assigned to that group. 您可以將 left、 right 或控制項的中央標頭文字的對齊。You can align the header text to the left, right, or center of the control. 指派給任何群組控制每次出現以外的其他屬性設定為值。Any groups assigned to a control appear whenever the property is set to a value other than . 群組可協助使用者尋找他們所尋找的項目分成有用的分類的項目。 groups help your users find the items they are looking for by separating the items into useful categories. 您可以建立您所需要的任何類別。You can create whatever categories you need. 根據清單排序的方式進行項目分組為一個典型的方法。One typical approach is to group the items based on the way the list is sorted. 例如，您可以群組項目初始項目名稱的字母依字母順序或子項目，例如類型或依序按一下 詳細資料檢視中的資料行標頭時排序清單的日期排序清單時。For example, you can group the items by the initial letter of the item name when the list is sorted alphabetically or by subitems such as type or date when the list is sorted by clicking a column header in the details view. Windows 檔案總管會使用這種類型的群組。Windows Explorer uses this type of grouping. 若要使用群組功能，新增一或多個物件至的集合控制項。To use the grouping feature, add one or more objects to the collection of a control. 在中設定的群組標頭文字和標頭對齊建構函式，或將它們設定使用和屬性。Set the group header text and header alignment in the constructor, or set them using the and properties. 若要暫時停用群組功能，請設定屬性設`false`。To temporarily disable the grouping feature, set the property to `false`. 您可以藉由指定中的群組項目將指派給群組建構函式，藉由設定屬性，或直接將加入的項目群組的集合。You can assign an item to a group by specifying the group in the constructor, by setting the property, or by directly adding the item to the collection of a group. 應該將所有項目指派給群組，才能讓它們顯示。All items should be assigned to groups before they are displayed. 不會指派給群組的任何項目會出現在預設群組中，具有標頭標籤"DefaultGroup{0}"。Any items that are not assigned to a group will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroup{0}". 預設群組未包含在集合，而且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它主要是用於偵錯，以確保所有項目有已正確新增至群組。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. 項目只能是一個群組中一次。An item can only be in one group at a time. 您可以變更的群組的設定項目屬於屬性在執行階段，或將它加入至自動移除先前的群組中的另一個群組的集合。You can change the group to which an item belongs by setting the property at run time or by adding it to the collection of another group, which automatically removes it from the previous group. 使用群組時，插入標記功能已停用。The insertion mark feature is disabled when using groups. 這是因為群組功能排序群組的成員資格的項目，而插入標記功能會使用具有拖放的重新定位控制項，已經不會排序其項目。This is because the grouping feature orders items by group membership, while the insertion mark feature is used with drag-and-drop repositioning in a control that does not already order its items. 群組是僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，當您的應用程式呼叫方法。 groups are available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在舊版的作業系統，與群組相關的任何程式碼沒有任何作用，並不會出現群組。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to groups has no effect and the groups will not appear. 如此一來，取決於群組功能的任何程式碼可能無法正確運作。As a result, any code that depends on the grouping feature might not work correctly. 您可能想要包含決定是否可以使用，「 群組 」 功能的程式碼，並提供替代功能，無法使用時。You might want to include code that determines whether the grouping feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，您可以提供替代的排序時不支援依群組排序的作業系統上執行。For example, you might want to provide alternate sorting when running on operating systems that do not support sorting by group. 「 群組 」 功能會提供相同的程式庫，提供作業系統的佈景主題功能。The grouping feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來組織項目詳細資料檢視中的子項目值的分組功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the grouping feature to organize items by subitem value in the details view. 這種形式是群組的類似於 Windows 檔案總管中所使用的群組。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在範例中，會以動態方式建立的群組。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 每一個子項目的資料行中，一個群組會針對每個唯一子項目的值。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父項目資料行中，建立一個群組的每個唯一的首字母。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 按一下資料行標頭的項目排序到建立該資料行的群組。Clicking the header of a column sorts the items into the groups created for that column. 再次按一下相同的資料行標頭會回復群組的順序。Clicking the same column header again reverses the order of the groups. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CPP/listviewgroupsexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/CS/listviewgroupsexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups/VB/listviewgroupsexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的類型時要顯示的資料行標頭屬性控制項設為而控制項有中指定的物件.The property allows you to specify the type of column headers to display when the property of the control is set to and the control has objects specified in the . 物件定義中所顯示的資料行控制項。 objects define the columns that are displayed in the control. 每個資料行用來顯示每個項目中的子項目資訊。Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the . 屬性可讓您指定資料行標題為可見的還是，才看得見，如果是否正常運作為可點按的按鈕。The property allows you to specify whether the column headers are visible or, if they are visible, whether they will function as clickable buttons. 如果屬性設定為，沒有顯示資料行標頭，雖然項目和子項目的控制項仍然會排列在資料行。If the property is set to , the column headers are not displayed, although the items and subitems of the control are still arranged in columns. 如果屬性設定為，資料行標頭做為按鈕，使用者可以按一下以執行某個動作，例如排序中的項目控制使用已按下 資料行中的項目，做為索引鍵。If the property is set to , the column headers act like buttons that users can click to carry out an action, such as sorting the items in the control using the items in the clicked column as a key. 您可以在處理常式中實作這種行為事件。You can implement this behavior in a handler for the event. 如果屬性設定為，資料行標頭會出現，但是無法按下。If the property is set to , the column headers appear, but cannot be clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範，可讓多個選取的項目。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 此範例示範如何設定和屬性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 它也會示範，和屬性。It also demonstrates the , and properties. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為物件`ListView1`並名為`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入標記功能可讓您以視覺方式指出應該的置放位置拖放作業中的項目拖曳至新位置時。The insertion mark feature lets you visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position. 這項功能的運作時，才屬性設定為`true`及何時控制項不會自動排序項目。This feature works only when the property is set to `true` and when the control does not sort the items automatically. 若要防止自動排序屬性必須設為並屬性必須設為， ，或。To prevent automatic sorting, the property must be set to and the property must be set to , , or . 此外，插入標記功能可能無法看見與群組功能，因為群組功能排序的項目，透過群組成員資格。Additionally, the insertion mark feature may not be visible with the grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership. 通常會使用類別中的處理常式或事件，以更新插入標記的位置，如拖曳項目。The class is typically used in a handler for the or event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged. 它也會在處理常式或事件，以拖曳的項目插入正確的位置。It is also used in a handler for the or event to insert a dragged item at the correct location. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 和[How to:在 Windows Form ListView 控制項中顯示插入標記](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md)。For more information, see and [How to: Display an Insertion Mark in a Windows Forms ListView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-an-insertion-mark-in-a-windows-forms-listview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 當您的應用程式呼叫時，插入標記功能是僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003方法。The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在舊版作業系統上，與插入標記相關的任何程式碼都沒有任何作用，而且不會出現插入標記。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark has no effect and the insertion mark will not appear. 如此一來，任何程式碼插入標記功能而定，可能無法正確運作。As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature might not work correctly. 您可能想要包含決定是否可以使用，這項功能的程式碼，並提供替代功能，無法使用時。You might want to include code that determines whether this feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，您可以略過所有實作拖放項目重新定位時不支援插入標記的作業系統上執行的程式碼。For example, you might want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks. > > 插入標記功能會提供相同的程式庫，提供作業系統的佈景主題功能。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用插入標記功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature. 此範例會實作拖放項目重新排序使用標準的拖曳事件。This example implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入標記的位置中的處理常式更新事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在這個處理常式中，滑鼠指標位置會相較於最接近的項目 的中間點，和結果來判斷是否插入標記出現在左邊或右邊的項目。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`使用者可按一下以選取它的項目文字來修改項目的文字，然後按一下 項目文字放入標籤文字編輯模式。When the property is set to `true`, the user is able to modify the text of an item by clicking the item text to select it and then clicking the item text again to put the label text into edit mode. 然後，使用者就可以修改或取代項目的文字標籤。The user can then modify or replace the item's text label. 您可以使用和使用者編輯的項目文字前後執行工作的事件。You can use the and events to perform tasks before and after the user edits an item's text. 無法修改子項目的文字，如果這個屬性設定為`true`。The text of subitems cannot be modified if this property is set to `true`. 若要變更的子項目文字，您可以對使用者顯示對話方塊中，當他們連按兩下中控制項的子項目。To change the text of subitems, you can display a dialog box to users when they double-click a subitem in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為或是，編輯標籤將不允許的值為何屬性。If the property is set to or , label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，如有需要將會包裝至下一行的文字的項目文字。When the property is set to `true`, the item text is wrapped to the next line of text if needed. 如果文字是超過兩行文字，文字會縮短。If the text is longer than two lines of text, the text is shortened. 如果使用者選取的項目，則會顯示所有項目文字。If the user selects the item, all the item text is displayed. 如果屬性設定為`false`，所有的項目文字會顯示在單一行。If the property is set to `false`, all item text is displayed on a single line. 整個項目文字會顯示當設為`false`。The entire item text is displayed when the is set to `false`. 這個屬性時才會使用屬性設定為或。This property is only used when the property is set to or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定物件，包含顯示大圖示的項目時所要使用的圖示 (當屬性設定為)。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ). 控制項可接受任何圖形格式控制項支援時顯示的圖示。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控制項不限於.ico 檔案。The control is not limited to .ico files. 一次指派給屬性，您可以設定屬性的每個中適當的映像中的索引位置的控制項。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 圖示的大小所指定。The size of the icons for the is specified by the . 因為您可以指定一個索引屬性，中所指定的物件和屬性應有相同的索引位置，針對要顯示的影像。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 比方說，如果的屬性設為 0，要用於大型和小型圖示的映像應該會在相同的索引位置，在中指定的物件和屬性。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 當索引鍵指定映像時，您仍然需要將小型和大型版本的映像放在相同的索引位置，在其各自的影像清單中。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 檢視之間切換時，一份清單中的映像的索引位置用來找出影像中的其他清單中，無論指定的索引鍵值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要設定若要顯示小圖示的項目時，使用 (所有以外的其他檢視模式)，使用屬性。To set the to use when displaying items with small icons (all view modes other than ), use the property. 如果您想要使用映像顯示項目狀態，請使用屬性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的排序比較子。

span.span: Gets or sets the sorting comparer for the control.
An that represents the sorting comparer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定執行中的項目排序的物件控制何時呼叫方法，或當項目加入至清單。The property allows you to specify the object that performs the sorting of items in a control when the method is called or when items are added to the list. 請注意，項目不會自動排序其標籤文字的變更時。Note that items are not sorted automatically when their label text changes. 指定的物件必須實作類別的執行個體介面，其具有單一方法呼叫。The specified object must be an instance of a class that implements the interface, which has a single method called . 若要提供自訂排序，例如，[詳細資料] 檢視中按一下資料行標頭時，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to provide custom sorting, for example, when a column header is clicked in the details view. 若要這樣做，請建立可實作介面並提供建構函式可接受要排序的資料行的索引。To do this, create a class that implements the interface and provides a constructor that accepts the index of a column to sort by. 然後，您就可以實作的處理常式建立使用已按下 資料行索引的這個類別的執行個體的事件。You can then implement a handler for the event that creates an instance of this class using the index of the clicked column. 當您設定屬性，以新的執行個體，使用指定的物件會自動排序控制項。When you set the property to the new instance, the control is automatically sorted using the specified object. 後續呼叫方法使用相同的物件。Subsequent calls to the method use the same object. > [!NOTE] > 當您設定的值屬性，自動呼叫方法。When you set the value of the property, the method is called automatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立包含表單的表單控制項，以手動方式排序項目中的資料行時按一下控制項時。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 此範例會定義一個叫做類別`ListViewItemComparer`可實執行介面比較。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 此範例會建立的執行個體`ListViewItemComparer`並使用它來設定屬性控制項。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法呼叫中事件處理常式使用中定義的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来執行的項目，根據按下的資料行排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`中, 可選取多個項目控制項。When the property is set to `true`, multiple items can be selected in the control. 若要選取多個項目，使用者必須按住 CTRL 鍵同時按一下來選取項目。To select multiple items, the user must hold down the CTRL key while clicking the items to select. 按一下以選取第一個項目，然後按住 SHIFT 鍵，然後按一下要選取的最後一個項目，則可以選取連續的項目。Consecutive items can be selected by clicking the first item to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last item to select. 您可以使用多個選取項目功能來選取多個項目控制項，並對所有選取的項目執行作業。You can use the multiple selection feature to select multiple items in the control and perform an operation on all the items selected. 例如，使用者可以選取多個項目，然後以滑鼠右鍵按一下選取的項目，以顯示捷徑功能表，顯示一組可選取的項目執行的工作。For example, the user could select multiple items and then right-click a selected item to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks that can be performed on the selected items. 若要判斷哪些項目中選取控制，請使用屬性。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property. 屬性可讓您存取，其中包含一份所選的項目。The property allows you to access the that contains a list of the selected items. 若要索引位置而非項目，您可以使用屬性來存取。If you want the index positions in the instead of the items, you can use the property to access the . 如果您不想允許多重選取，在，但仍想要提供使用者讓多個項目，以供選擇，您可以藉由設定顯示核取方塊屬性設`true`。If you do not want to allow multiple selections in the , yet still want to offer the user a way for multiple items to be chosen, you can display check boxes by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範，可讓多個選取的項目。The following code example demonstrates a that allows multiple items to be selected. 此範例示範如何設定和屬性。The example demonstrates setting the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為物件`ListView1`並名為`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用字母表中的字元限制的新編輯的標籤的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to restrict a newly edited label to characters in the alphabet. 此範例會使用類別來取得新的標籤的每個字元的 ASCII 字元碼。The example uses the class to obtain the ASCII character code of each character of the new label. 如果字元落在代表數字的 ASCII 碼，新的標籤無法套用至項目。If the character falls between the ASCII codes that represent numbers, the new label cannot be applied to the item. 這個範例需要您已建立表單和它所加入的項目上的控制項。This example requires that you have created a control on a form and added items to it. 這個範例也會需要您已連接範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式的事件。The example also requires that you have connected the event to the event handler defined in the example code. 若要使用類別，您的檔案必須包含命名空間。In order to use the class, your file must include the namespace. [!code-cpp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.AfterLabelEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.AfterLabelEdit/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立包含表單的表單控制項，以手動方式排序項目中的資料行時按一下控制項時。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 此範例會定義一個叫做類別`ListViewItemComparer`可實執行介面比較。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 此範例會建立的執行個體`ListViewItemComparer`並使用它來設定屬性控制項。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法呼叫中事件處理常式使用中定義的方法`ListViewItemComparer`来執行的項目，根據按下的資料行排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OwnerDraw { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.OwnerDraw : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是由作業系統或您提供的程式碼所描繪。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.

value.span: 如果要由您提供的程式碼描繪 控制項，則為 ，如果要由作業系統描繪 控制項，則為 。

span.span: if the control is drawn by code that you provide; if the control is drawn by the operating system.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A通常由作業系統繪製控制項。A control is normally drawn by the operating system. 若要自訂的外觀項目、 子項目和資料行標頭，設定屬性設`true`，並提供一或多個下列事件處理常式： ， ， 。In order to customize the appearance of items, subitems, and column headers, set the property to `true` and provide a handler for one or more of the following events: , , . 這稱為主控描繪。This is called owner drawing. 時屬性設定為，所有三個事件發生的事件; 否則只就會發生事件。When the property is set to , all three events occur; otherwise, only the event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 子項目資訊通常會出現在並排顯示檢視，以及詳細資料檢視，但在圖格檢視中，它必須繪製的處理常式事件。Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the event. 事件不會發生的任何子項目，且未物件加入集合。The event does not occur for any subitems for which no object has been added to the collection. 也請注意，每個的第一個子項目物件代表父項目本身，而且會顯示在第一個資料行。Note also that the first subitem of each object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column. 在詳細資料 檢視中，您可以處理事件的所有子項目，例如背景繪製通用的項目，並處理事件來繪製個別的子項目，例如文字值的項目。In the details view, you can handle the event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values. 您也可以繪製所有項目可能很不方便使用的兩個事件，其中之一的控制。You can also draw all items in the control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient. 若要繪製資料行的標頭詳細資料檢視中，您必須處理事件。To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免問題主控描繪，覆寫時，圖形閃爍控制項，並將屬性設`true`。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何提供自訂活動，抽獎獲得控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 在範例中的控制項有漸層背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 與負數值的子項目會有紅色的前景和黑色背景。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 處理常式事件繪製整個項目的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 處理常式事件繪製的文字值和文字和背景有負值的子項目。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 處理常式事件繪製的各個資料行標頭。A handler for the event draws each column header. A元件提供詳細資料檢視和 [清單] 檢視之間切換的方法。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在清單檢視中，只有就會引發事件。In the list view, only the event is raised. 在此情況下，文字和背景同時繪製事件處理常式。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當物件是處於虛擬模式，它會建立物件，以動態方式而不要使用集合。When a object is in virtual mode, it creates objects dynamically instead of using the collection. 必須在建立物件時，會引發這個事件物件。This event is raised when the object must create a object. 此事件處理常式應該建立適當或從快取中擷取它，並將它上一步所透過的傳遞屬性。A handler for this event should create the appropriate or retrieve it from the cache, and pass it back by way of the property. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範此事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates a handler for this event. 在此範例中，listView1 需要每個以顯示其索引的平方。In this example, listView1 needs each to display the square of its index. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分屬性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合變更時屬性變更。The collection changes whenever the property of a changes. 屬性變更可能是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者選取的項目，或清除選取項目。The property change can occur programmatically or when the user selects an item or clears the selection of an item. 當使用者選擇未按下 ctrl 鍵，即可執行多個選取的項目時，控制項就會先清除先前的選取範圍。When the user selects an item without pressing CTRL to perform a multiple selection, the control first clears the previous selection. 在此情況下，一次先前選取的每個項目和新選取的項目一次，就會發生此事件。In this case, this event occurs one time for each item that was previously selected and one time for the newly selected item. 若要判斷哪些項目中選取控制，請使用屬性來存取。To determine which items are selected in the control, use the property to access the . 您可以建立這個事件，以在選取的項目變更時執行工作的事件處理常式控制項。You can create an event handler for this event to perform tasks whenever there is a change to the selected items in the control. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定物件，其中包含要顯示小圖示的項目時，使用的圖示 (當以外的其他屬性設定為任何值)。The property allows you to specify an object that contains icons to use when displaying items with small icons (when the property is set to any value other than ). 控制項可接受任何圖形格式控制項支援時顯示的圖示。The control can accept any graphics format that the control supports when displaying icons. 控制項不限於.ico 檔案。The control is not limited to .ico files. 一次指派給屬性，您可以設定屬性的每個中適當的映像中的索引位置的控制項。Once an is assigned to the property, you can set the property of each in the control to the index position of the appropriate image in the . 圖示的大小所指定屬性。The size of the icons for the is specified by the property. 因為您可以指定一個索引屬性，中所指定的物件和屬性應有相同的索引位置，針對要顯示的影像。Because only one index can be specified for the property, the objects specified in the and properties should have the same index positions for the images to display. 比方說，如果的屬性設為 0，要用於大型和小型圖示的映像應該會在相同的索引位置，在中指定的物件和屬性。For example, if the property of a is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the objects specified in the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 當索引鍵指定映像時，您仍然需要將小型和大型版本的映像放在相同的索引位置，在其各自的影像清單中。When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 檢視之間切換時，一份清單中的映像的索引位置用來找出影像中的其他清單中，無論指定的索引鍵值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 若要設定以顯示大圖示的項目時，使用 (當屬性設定為)，使用屬性。To set the to use when displaying items with large icons (when the property is set to ), use the property. 如果您想要使用映像顯示項目狀態，請使用屬性。If you want to use images to display item state, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用排序的項目屬性，根據項目文字的項目進行排序。Typically items are sorted using the property, which sorts items based on the item text. 若要自訂的排序次序，您必須撰寫類別可實作介面，並設定該類別之物件的屬性。To customize the sort order, you must write a class that implements the interface and set the property to an object of that class. 這非常有用，例如，當您想要排序的子項目文字的項目。This is useful, for example, when you want to sort items by subitem text. 如需有關如何執行手動排序的項目數的詳細資訊，請參閱範例屬性。For more information on performing manual sorting of items, see the example for the property. 如果以外的其他屬性設定為值或者屬性設定，則新增項目時自動排序清單。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items are added. 標籤文字變更時，不會自動排序項目。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定是否有項目會按照控制項。The property allows you to specify whether or not items are sorted in the control. 根據預設，會執行任何排序。By default, no sorting is performed. 當屬性設定為或中的項目會自動依字母順序遞增排序 (當此屬性設定為) 或遞減字母順序排列 (時屬性設定為)。When the property is set to or , the items in the are sorted automatically in ascending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ) or descending alphabetical order (when the property is set to ). 您可以使用這個屬性，來自動排序項目中所顯示的您的控制，讓使用者更輕鬆地尋找項目，可用的項目數量龐大時。You can use this property to automatically sort items that are displayed in your control to make it easier for users to find items when a large number of items are available. 如果您想要執行排序，而不使用您自己的項目屬性，請使用搭配屬性方法。If you want to perform your own item sorting instead of using the property, use the property in combination with the method. 如果以外的其他屬性設定為值或者屬性設定時，會自動排序清單項目新增時。If the property is set to a value other than or if the property is set, the list is sorted automatically when items is added. 標籤文字變更時，不會自動排序項目。Items are not sorted automatically when the label text changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定，其中包含要用來表示應用程式專屬的狀態中的項目影像控制項。The property allows you to specify an that contains images to use to represent an application-specific state of an item in a control. 狀態影像會顯示項目圖示的左邊。State images are displayed to the left of an icon for the item. 您可以使用狀態的影像，例如 checked 與 unchecked 核取方塊，以指出應用程式定義的項目狀態。You can use state images, such as checked and unchecked check boxes, to indicate application-defined item states. 狀態影像會顯示在的所有檢視控制項。State images are visible in all views of the control. 如果中指定屬性並屬性設定為`true`，在 0 和 1 中的索引位置的映像而不是核取方塊會顯示。If an is specified in the property and the property is set to `true`, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the are displayed instead of the check box. 而不是未檢查的核取方塊，顯示的影像索引位置 0，而不是已核取核取方塊顯示的影像索引位置 1。The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會控制大小的圖格時屬性設定為。This property controls the size of tiles when the property is set to . 設定這個屬性是可避免當子項目文字太長而無法以單行顯示自動換。Setting this property is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long to be displayed on a single line. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用並排顯示功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use the tiling feature. 在範例中，並排顯示檢視會顯示代表書籍項目。In the example, the tile view displays items that represent books. 每個項目會顯示為磚，其中包含活頁簿、 標題、 作者和出版年份的圖示。Each item is shown as a tile containing an icon of a book, the title, the author, and the publication year. 工作的範例程式碼，您必須包含在範例所示的相同目錄中名為 Book.ico 的圖示檔案。For the example code to work, you must include an icon file named Book.ico in the same directory as the example. 若要查看圖格不含圖示檢視中，標記為註解相關行物件。To see the tile view without icons, comment out the lines relating to the object. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Tiling#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Tiling/CPP/listviewtilingexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Tiling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Tiling/CS/listviewtilingexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Tiling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Tiling/VB/listviewtilingexample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有零 (0) 的索引位置的項目一開始，會在頂端控制項。Initially, the item with the index position of zero (0) is at the top of the control. 如果視窗控制項內容捲動，另一個項目可能會在控制項的頂端。If the control contents are scrolled, a different item can be at the top of the control. 您可以使用這個屬性來表示，或判斷哪一個項目會顯示在頂端控制項。You can use this property to indicate or determine which item is visible at the top of the control. 值屬性不會一直保存，根據所需的最上層項目在清單檢視中的所在。The value of the property will not always persist, depending on where the desired top item is in the list view. 在中顯示的項目數目控制在任何時間取決於清單檢視的高度和它所包含的項目大小。The number of items visible in a control at any time depends on the height of the list view and the size of the items it contains. 如果項目數目超過清單檢視的高度，項目會繼續到多個頁面，使用者可以捲動。If the items exceed the height of the list view, the items will continue onto multiple pages, which the user can scroll through. 如果您設定屬性中的最後一頁的項目，項目會自動捲動到檢視中; 不過，會設定為最後一頁的實際的最上層項目。If you set the property to an item in the last page of the , the item will automatically be scrolled into view; however, will be set to the actual top item of the last page. 若要確保特定項目是控制項的可見區域 （但不是一定是在頂端的位置） 中，使用方法。To ensure that a specific item is in the visible region of the control (but not necessarily in the top position), use the method. > [!NOTE] > 設定這個屬性沒有作用時屬性值是`false`。Setting this property has no effect when the property value is `false`. > > 設定這個屬性的版本中不支援[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]早於 2.0 版。Setting this property is not supported in versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] prior to version 2.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何重設的樣式物件的子項目，使用屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates resetting the style of a object's subitems through the use of the property and the method. 若要執行此範例，請將下列程式碼貼到包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`並呼叫`InitializeListView`表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理常式。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1` and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更控制在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 啟用自訂的狀態設為表示項目是否已核取或取消核取或是處於不定狀態的影像。Changes to the control in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 enable custom state images to be set to indicate whether an item is checked or unchecked or in an indeterminate state. 這項功能，加上[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 具有不同.NET Framework 1.1 的行為。With the addition of this feature, the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 has different behavior than the .NET Framework 1.1. 如果您已建立應用程式是依賴中的行為[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1 中，確定屬性設定為`true`，這是預設值。If you have created applications that depend on the behavior in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1, be sure that the property is set to `true`, which is the default value. 若要充分利用自訂狀態映像，設定至`false`。In order to fully take advantage of custom state images, set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]設計工具中，屬性會設定為`false`。If you are using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] designer, the property will be set to `false`.
