summary.span: 取得或設定控制項中項目的顯示方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how items are displayed in the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的顯示類型控制項會用來顯示項目。The property allows you to specify the type of display the control uses to display items. 您可以設定屬性來顯示每個具有大型或小型圖示的項目，或以垂直清單顯示的項目。You can set the property to display each item with large or small icons or display items in a vertical list. 此最豐富的選項為詳細資料檢視中，可讓您檢視不僅項目，但每個項目指定的任何子項目。The richest option is the details view, which allows you to view not only the items but any subitems specified for each item. 在方格中，會顯示每個項目，使用垂直列每個項目和顯示資料行行首的資料行，在每個項目的子項目。Each item is displayed in a grid, with each item listed vertically and the subitems for each item displayed in a column, with column headers. 詳細資料檢視會顯示給使用者的資料庫資訊的最佳方法。The details view is a perfect way to display database information to a user. Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，您也可以平衡圖形和文字資訊，方法是顯示大圖示，以及您所選擇的子項目資訊的圖格以顯示項目。With Windows XP and Windows Server 2003, you can also display items as tiles that balance graphical and textual information by showing a large icon along with subitem information of your choosing. 若要啟用並排顯示檢視，您的應用程式必須呼叫方法。To enable tile view, your application must call the method. 小型影像檢視會顯示圖示和文字資訊與每個項目右邊的圖示。The small-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information to the right of the icon. 大型影像檢視會顯示具有圖示和文字的資訊，圖示下的每個項目。The large-image view displays each item with an icon and textual information below the icon. 如需映像清單圖示的大小由屬性for或屬性。The size of the icons for the image list is specified by the property of the for the or properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用多個映像清單，針對小型和大型圖示檢視中，使用控制項，您應該將放置小型和大型版本在相同的映像的索引位置，在其各自的影像清單中。If you are using multiple image lists, for small and large icon view, with a control, you should place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists. 檢視之間切換時，一份清單中的映像的索引位置用來找出影像中的其他清單中，無論指定的索引鍵值。When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified. 中的屬性，大部分控制會影響在不同檢視的行為或顯示的方式。Most of the properties in the control affect how the different views behave or are displayed. 一些會影響項目的檢視的屬性才有用時屬性設定為特定的值，有些則是用於所有檢視。Some properties that affect the views of the items are only useful when the property is set to a specific value, while others are useful in all views. 比方說，這類的屬性並才有用時屬性設定為，而和屬性可用於所有檢視。For example, properties such as and are only useful when the property is set to , while the and properties are useful in all views. 下表顯示一些成員和檢視中有效。The following table shows some of the members and the views they are valid in. |ListView 成員ListView member|檢視View| |---------------------|----------| | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 方法 method|| ||以外的所有檢視 All views except | | 屬性 property| 或 or | | 事件 event|| | 方法 method|、 或 , , or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 方法 method| 或 or | | 屬性 property|以外的所有檢視 All views except | | 屬性 property|| | 屬性 property|、 或 , , or | 您可以使用屬性提供的應用程式中資料的不同檢視，或鎖定特定的檢視，以使用該檢視的優點。You can use the property to provide different views of data in your application, or to lock a specific view to utilize that view's benefits. 例如，屬性通常會設定為因為詳細資料檢視提供數個檢視選項不適用於其他檢視。For example, the property is often set to because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views. > [!NOTE] > 如果您控制項並沒有指定任何資料行標頭，並在您設定屬性設，則控制項將不會顯示任何項目。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any items. 如果您控制項並沒有指定任何資料行標頭，並在您設定屬性設，則控制項將不會顯示任何子項目。If your control does not have any column headers specified and you set the property to , the control will not display any subitems. 並排顯示檢視的左邊和文字的資訊，在右側顯示大型圖示使用的每個項目。The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right. 文字的資訊是由項目標籤後面的子項目所組成。The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems. 根據預設，會顯示第一個子項目，它會對應到項目標籤。By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label. 若要顯示其他子項目，您必須新增物件至集合。To display additional subitems, you must add objects to the collection. 在磚中的每一個子項目會對應到資料行標頭。Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header. 若要控制哪一個子項目會顯示與所顯示的順序，您必須設定每個項目的屬性和每個標頭的屬性。To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the property for each item and the property for each header. 您可以再新增、 移除和重新排列中的標頭集合來達到所要的結果。You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the collection to achieve the desired result. 若要控制並排顯示檢視中的圖格的大小，設定屬性。To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the property. 這是用來避免在子項目文字太長而無法在同一行時換。This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line. 如需並排顯示檢視的範例，請參閱屬性。For an example of the tile view, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 雖然資料行只會顯示在詳細資料檢視中，不含資料行的標頭的子項目不會顯示在 詳細資料檢視 或 並排顯示檢視中。Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view. 並排顯示檢視是僅適用於 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003，當您的應用程式呼叫方法。The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the method. 在舊版作業系統中，任何與並排顯示檢視相關的程式碼都無效，而且 控制項會顯示在大圖示檢視中。On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the control displays in the large icon view. 如此一來，取決於並排顯示檢視的任何程式碼可能無法正確運作。As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly. 您可能想要包含決定是否可以使用，並排顯示檢視的程式碼，並提供替代功能，無法使用時。You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，當您使用主控描繪自訂的外觀並排顯示檢視中的項目，您可能要使用適用於在大型圖示檢視的繪圖程式碼時不支援並排顯示檢視的作業系統上執行。For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view. 並排顯示檢視功能會提供相同的程式庫，提供作業系統的佈景主題功能。The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要檢查此程式庫的可用性，請呼叫方法多載，並傳入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不是處於虛擬模式，事件就會發生。If the is not in virtual mode, the event will occur. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，以`true`放進入虛擬模式。Setting the property to `true` puts the into virtual mode. 在虛擬模式中，一般集合是未使用。In Virtual mode, the normal collection is unused. 相反地，物件會以動態方式建立為需要它們。Instead, objects are created dynamically as the requires them. 虛擬的模式可以是在許多情況下很有用。Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances. 如果物件必須填入的非常大型的集合已經在記憶體中，從建立物件中每個項目可以是浪費資源。If a object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a object for each entry can be wasteful. 在虛擬模式中，會建立所需的項目。In virtual mode, only the items required are created. 在其他情況下，值物件可能需要重新計算常見問題，並對整個集合進行此動作會產生無法接受的效能。In other cases, the values of the objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance. 在虛擬模式中，會計算的必要項目。In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated. 若要使用的虛擬模式，您必須處理事件，就會引發每次需要項目。In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the event, which is raised every time the requires an item. 這個事件處理常式應該建立所屬的指定索引處的物件。This event handler should create the object that belongs at the specified index. 颾魤 ㄛ屬性必須設為虛擬清單的大小。In addition, the property must be set to the size of the virtual list. 處理事件可讓在虛擬模式中搜尋。Handling the event enables searching in virtual mode. 如果未處理這個事件，並方法會傳回`null`。If this event is not handled, the and methods will return `null`. 您可以處理事件，以維護的快取物件。You can handle the event in order to maintain a cache of objects. 如果計算或查詢，以建立物件會耗費資源，維護快取可改善效能。If the calculation or lookup to create a object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance. 如果屬性設定為，值將會自動變更為當設定為`true`。If the property is set to , the value will automatically be changed to when is set to `true`. 在虛擬模式中，集合已停用。In virtual mode, the collection is disabled. 嘗試存取它會導致。Attempting to access it results in an . 也是如此集合和集合。The same is true of the collection and the collection. 如果您想要擷取的已選取或核取的項目，使用和集合改為。If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the and collections instead. ## Examples 此範例說明簡單其內容會先一萬個方塊。This example illustrates a simple whose contents are the first ten thousand squares. 它會處理搜尋，並使用快取來提升效能。It handles searching and uses a cache for increased performance.
